parameters.label: organization-defined subset of identified covert channels

parts.name: statement
parts.prose: Measure the bandwidth of {{ sc-31.3_prm_1 }} in the operational environment of the system.

parts.name: guidance
parts.prose: Measuring covert channel bandwidth in specified operational environments helps organizations determine how much information can be covertly leaked before such leakage adversely affects mission or business functions. Covert channel bandwidth may be significantly different when measured in settings that are independent of the specific environments of operation, including laboratories or system development environments.
